paramInformation.label: Report interval
paramInformation.description: Interval of unsolicited meter reports in 10s increments; 0 to disable.

paramInformation.label: Energy meter report interval
paramInformation.description: Interval of active energy meter reports in minutes; 0 to disable.

paramInformation.description: Which Central Scene to trigger on multiple button presses (2x-5x) of extension input S
